snippet: As cameras become more familiar sights, lawmakers in states that have allowed cities to make decisions about photo enforcement are starting to get involved.
abstract: Traffic cameras have spread to 582 communities nationwide to catch those who speed, run red lights or commit other violations; as their use has spread, lawmakers in states that have allowed cities to make decisions about photo enforcement are starting to get involved.
lead_paragraph: As cameras become more familiar sights, lawmakers in states that have allowed cities to make decisions about photo enforcement are starting to get involved.

headline.seo: Traffic Cameras Draw More Scrutiny by States
headline.main: Traffic Cameras Draw More Scrutiny by States
headline.print_headline: Traffic Cameras Draw More Scrutiny by States
